data.description: Be part of an amazing story. Macy’s is more than just a store. We’re a story. One that’s captured the hearts and minds of America for more than 160 years. A story about innovations and traditions…about inspiring stores and irresistible products…about the excitement of the Macy’s 4th of July Fireworks, and the wonder of the Thanksgiving Day Parade. We’ve been part of memorable moments and milestones for countless customers and colleagues. Those stories are part of what makes this such a special place to work. Job Overview The Macy’s Technology Summer Internship Program provides students with the opportunity to apply classroom knowledge in a real-world setting while exploring a potential engineering career within our organization. Macy’s Tech combines the entrepreneurial spirit of a start-up with the stability of an iconic national brand, powered by a strong national footprint, a robust e-commerce business, and a seamless mobile experience that connects it all.
